targets.query:
from(bucket: "smart_meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "dsmr/reading/electricity_hourly_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "dsmr/reading/gas_hourly_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "watermeter/reading/current_value")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> difference()
    |> timedMovingAverage(every: 15m, period: 1h)

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "dsmr/reading/electricity_hourly_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "dsmr/reading/gas_hourly_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "watermeter/reading/current_value")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> timedMovingAverage(every: 5m, period: 1h)
    |> difference()
    |> timedMovingAverage(every: 30m, period: 1h)

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "dsmr/reading/electricity_delivered_1")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> increase()

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "dsmr/reading/electricity_delivered_2")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> increase()

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "dsmr/consumption/gas/delivered")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> increase()

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "watermeter/reading/current_value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> increase()

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "dsmr/reading/electricity_currently_delivered")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "dsmr/consumption/gas/delivered")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: "smart_meter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "watermeter/reading/current_value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative()
